commit.message:
locale_facets.h (_Format_cache): _S_ecks -> _S_x.

	* bits/locale_facets.h (_Format_cache): _S_ecks -> _S_x.
	* bits/locale_facets.tcc (num_get<char>::_M_extract): Fix for hex.
